*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Saucedo, August 14, 1826. Movements of various Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*A party of *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*were seen last week on the *location_mentioned*Brazos*/location_mentioned*, near the *location_mentioned*Bexar road*/location_mentioned*: a detachment of the *person_mentioned*Militia */person_mentioned*of that *location_mentioned*neighborhood */location_mentioned*went in pursuit and followed them to *location_mentioned*within ten miles of their villages*/location_mentioned*. That detachment will remain some time in the vicinity of the *location_mentioned*villages*/location_mentioned*, to watch them; and I shall have them relieved by another *person_mentioned*party*/person_mentioned*, so as to keep in the field a permanent guard on the *location_mentioned*frontier */location_mentioned*to give timely notice in case the *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*should leave them in force for the purpose of attacking us.*/p*
*p*I have heard from a *person_mentioned*Choctaw Indian*/person_mentioned*, that the *person_mentioned*Comanches */person_mentioned*are going to make a grand effort, next fall against *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*and the *location_mentioned*Rio Grande frontier*/location_mentioned*, and that the *person_mentioned*Tahuacanoes*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Wacos*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*Tahuayases*/person_mentioned* will join them in their attack upon us in this *location_mentioned*quarter*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*All the *person_mentioned*Bidais */person_mentioned*are here, in flight from the *person_mentioned*Aynais*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Kichais */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Apadaches */person_mentioned*with whom they have fought a battle on the *location_mentioned*Trinity*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Cushatte Chiefs*/person_mentioned* arrived here this morning; I do not know for what purpose as I have not yet seen them.*/p*
*p*The last news, received a few days since from the *person_mentioned*Cherokees*/person_mentioned*, are very favorable; it appears that they are only waiting for the order of the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*to commence an attack upon our *person_mentioned*enemies*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*God and Liberty.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="08-14-1826">August 14th 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
